item.title: About
item.description: Prelude I wrote my first lines of code when I was 11, writing scripts for RPG Maker in Ruby. At that age I was already doing tricky things on the computer like setting up different emulators and using a VPN to play MMOs that weren’t available in my country. No matter how complex the problem, I debug and try to fix it until I solve it or prove it impossible.
